ai-ja301:1.4_0: so well-taught, delighted with the army.
ai-ja301:3.2_0: is truth, among the most excellent of wealth.
ai-ja301:3.3_0: Those who speak in accord with what you said,
ai-ja301:4.1_0: “Didn’t you whose mind is being spoken, brahmin,
ai-ja301:4.2_0: even the gods and humans of Host.
ai-ja301:4.6_0: Wherever they were all the hermits in him.”
ai-ja301:5.1_0: The Shorter Discourse on the Gosiṅga
